solution_line_template: Each artichoke makes {ounces_per_artichoke_val} ounces of dip because there are {artichokes_per_batch} artichokes per {ounces_per_batch} ounces

He can make {total_ounces_dip} ounces of dip because {num_artichokes_bought} x ({ounces_per_batch}/{artichokes_per_batch}) = {intermediate_numerator}/{intermediate_denominator} = <<{num_artichokes_bought}*({ounces_per_batch}/{artichokes_per_batch})={total_ounces_dip}>>{total_ounces_dip}
